alert.note: Alert for Outagamie (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 12 at 6:14PM CDT until April 15 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR BROWN...NORTHERN CALUMET...EASTERN OUTAGAMIE AND NORTHWESTERN MANITOWOC COUNTIES... At 614 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Green Bay, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Green Bay, Appleton, Menasha, Kaukauna, Little Chute, Kimberly, Denmark, Darboy, Bellevue Town and Northern Lake Winnebago. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
